name: Anime All-Stars
description: Iconic characters and moments from beloved anime series

cards.title: Legendary Super Saiyan
cards.description: Warrior with incredible power and fighting spirit
cards.imageDescription: Muscular warrior with spiky hair, glowing aura, fists clenched in fighting stance
cards.effect: On summon: +3 damage to all champions this turn; Passive: Gain 1 MP when you play a skill
cards.flavor: The power of a warrior knows no bounds.

cards.title: Transformation Sequence
cards.description: Unlock your true potential in a flash of light
cards.imageDescription: Character surrounded by glowing light, transforming into a more powerful form
cards.effect: Double the effect of your next card this turn
cards.flavor: When push comes to shove, heroes always have one more trick up their sleeve.

cards.title: Kamehameha Wave
cards.description: Channel your energy into a devastating energy blast
cards.imageDescription: Character cupping hands together, blue energy beam shooting forward
cards.flavor: The signature move of many legendary fighters.

cards.title: Power of Friendship Flashback
cards.description: Remember the bonds that give you strength
cards.imageDescription: Group of friends standing together, warm light surrounding them
cards.effect: Restore 4 HP to all your champions, draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: In the end, it's always the power of friendship that saves the day.

cards.title: Prodigy Mage Apprentice
cards.description: Young spellcaster with incredible magical potential
cards.imageDescription: Young person in wizard robes, casting multiple colorful spells simultaneously
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random skills to your hand; Passive: Skills cost 1 less MP
cards.flavor: Age is no barrier to magical mastery.

cards.title: Throwing Star Barrage
cards.description: Unleash a flurry of razor-sharp throwing stars
cards.imageDescription: Ninja throwing multiple shiny shurikens in rapid succession
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to all opponent champions
cards.flavor: Speed and precision are the hallmarks of a true ninja.

cards.title: Mecha Pilot
cards.description: A skilled pilot who can summon a powerful robotic companion
cards.imageDescription: Young pilot in cockpit of futuristic mecha robot, ready for battle
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target; On summon: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: The fusion of human skill and mechanical power.

cards.title: Nine-Tailed Fox Spirit
cards.description: A mystical fox spirit with incredible magical abilities
cards.imageDescription: Elegant fox with nine tails, surrounded by mystical energy and cherry blossoms
cards.effect: On summon: Draw 2 cards; Passive: Skills cost 1 less MP
cards.flavor: Ancient wisdom and power beyond measure.
